name: RantingRobot
0:
”Alexa, launch Ranting Robot.”
”Alexa, tell Ranting Robot to rant.”
”Alexa, ask Ranting Robot how it feels.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ranting robot
des:
Ranting Robot is a great gag skill for friends, family and coworkers. Once invoked, it will passionately describe how it feels to be a vocal interface device to all within range for several minutes at a time.

To stop the rant say, "Alexa stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
